alert.note: Alert for Watauga (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 12 at 2:37PM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Watauga County. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The cold wind chills as low as 5 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
